title: Upcoming AI Events
author: Kofi Okoro
content:
Exciting AI Events and Conferences to Watch in 2024

The world of Artificial Intelligence (AI) is constantly evolving, and staying updated with the latest trends, technologies, and insights is crucial for professionals in the field. Here is a roundup of some of the most interesting and impactful AI events scheduled for 2024, offering unparalleled opportunities for learning, networking, and innovation.

AI & Big Data Expo North America

Scheduled for June 5-6, 2024, at the Santa Clara Convention Center in California, the AI & Big Data Expo North America is one of the premier events in the AI and Big Data space. With over 7,000 attendees expected, this expo will feature 18 conference tracks and more than 250 speakers. Key topics will include Responsible AI, AI for Digital Transformation, and Enterprise AI Adoption. This event is ideal for CTOs, CDOs, data scientists, and AI enthusiasts looking to explore the latest innovations and strategies (AI Expo, 2024).

The AI Summit London

Taking place on June 12-13, 2024, in London, this summit brings together top technologists and business professionals to explore real-world applications of AI. With a lineup of over 300 speakers and six stages, attendees will gain insights into the latest trends, groundbreaking research, and innovative applications transforming various industries. The event also offers unique networking opportunities and an AI expo showcasing cutting-edge solutions (The AI Summit London, 2024).

Data + AI Summit

From June 10-13, 2024, San Francisco will host the Data + AI Summit, an event by Databricks. This summit will cover over 500 sessions on topics such as data warehousing, data governance, and generative AI. With thousands of data leaders, engineers, scientists, and architects expected to attend, this summit provides an excellent platform for learning and networking. Attendees can also participate in hands-on training and certification programs (Databricks, 2024).

AI Engineer World's Fair

Held from June 25-27, 2024, in San Francisco, this event is a must-attend for software engineers and AI developers. The AI Engineer World's Fair will feature speakers from leading tech companies and offer workshops on the latest AI technologies. This fair provides a high signal-to-noise ratio environment, making it a valuable event for professionals looking to deepen their AI knowledge (AI Engineer, 2024).

Coalesce

Coalesce, scheduled for October 7-10, 2024, in Las Vegas and available online, is a four-day event covering machine learning, AI, data anomaly detection, and data engineering. This hybrid conference offers both in-person and virtual attendance options, providing great flexibility. It is an excellent opportunity for networking and gaining insights from industry experts (DataCamp, 2024).

World Summit AI

Taking place on October 9-10, 2024, in Amsterdam, the World Summit AI is one of the largest AI events globally. It features keynote speakers, an expo, and tracks on topics such as Generative AI and AI in finance. This summit is ideal for professionals looking to explore the latest AI advancements and network with peers from around the world (DataCamp, 2024).

Big Data Conference Europe

From November 19-22, 2024, in Vilnius, Lithuania, the Big Data Conference Europe will be held in a hybrid format. This conference will focus on topics like ChatGPT, deep learning, and predictive analytics. It includes workshops, keynote sessions, and networking opportunities, making it a valuable event for data professionals and AI enthusiasts (DataCamp, 2024).

AI for Pharma and Healthcare Summit

Scheduled for September 24-26, 2024, this summit will explore the application of AI in the pharmaceutical and healthcare sectors. It will cover topics such as drug discovery, personalized medicine, and AI-driven diagnostics. This event is a great platform for healthcare professionals and researchers to learn about the latest AI advancements in their field (Unite.AI, 2024).

These upcoming AI events and conferences provide invaluable opportunities for professionals to stay ahead of the curve, gain new insights, and network with industry leaders. Whether you are looking to learn about the latest AI technologies, explore real-world applications, or connect with like-minded professionals, these events are not to be missed.
